Text.Page:
Why would these spiders attack in such an organized fashion? Are they doing their own thinking, or...

Go talk to Ordinio. He believes something else is controlling them. I laughed at him, of course, but perhaps he was right all along.

Just talk to him, okay?
Oh! Hello! You startled me for a moment. Anyone who's spent time down here gets a little jumpy. It's the sounds they make, the clicks of their claws.
